title: Constitution Gardens: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs       The National Capital Region (NCR), headquartered in Washington, DC, administers the National Mall and monumental core parks that were established at the same time the Nation's Capital was founded in the period 1790-1792. This oldest collection of national park areas, along with dozens of historic sites, natural areas, and Civil War battlefields comprise today's National Capital Region of the National Park Service. National Capital Region Office of Public Affairs 1100 Ohio Drive, S.W. Washington, D.C. 20242 (202) 619-7222
